Docs.summary: Draws a border, background, or both around another element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Border can have only one child. To display multiple child elements, you need to place an additional <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element within the parent Border. You can then place child elements within that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
If you want to display a border around your content, you must place the elements within a parent Border element.
